name: Turbo Snow Skiing
summary: Ski your way through several snow covered mountain levels as fast as you can but be careful to land on your skis or you will wipeout with ragdoll physics. Tilt your device to lean your rider and perform flips. Press the turbo button to fire up the jet turbine attached to your skis for a burst of speed. Hit the nitro turbo boost canisters all around the levels for an even greater speed burst. Navigate your way to the finish line using hidden ice caves for shortcuts. Try the stunt levels which test your skills in performing as many backflips or frontflips as you can. Find and unlock hidden levels throughout the game.
